languages.text: {n}Спустя миг вам вторит и она. Подхватив знакомую молитву, она сливается с вами в едином воззвании к Неумирающему, уверенно следуя к выходу...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пока Кибелла смотрит в другую сторону, вы попросту перешагиваете сплошную линию — и устремляетесь к выходу...{/n}

languages.text: {n}She recognises the prayer and immediately joins you. She recites the familiar words, merging with you in a single plea to the Undying One, and confidently steps in the direction of the exit...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя миг вам вторит и она. Подхватив знакомую молитву, она сливается с вами в едином воззвании к Неумирающему, уверенно следуя к выходу...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Reconoce la oración y se une de inmediato a ella. Recita las familiares palabras, uniéndose a ti en una sola plegaria al Inmortal, y camina con confianza en dirección a la salida...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She recognises the prayer and immediately joins you. She recites the familiar words, merging with you in a single plea to the Undying One, and confidently steps in the direction of the exit...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Reconoce la oración y se une de inmediato a ella. Recita las familiares palabras, uniéndose a ti en una sola plegaria al Inmortal, y camina con confianza en dirección a la salida...{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼女は祈りの言葉を認識し、すぐにあなたに合わせる。彼女は慣れ親しんだ言葉を復唱し、あなたと一体になって不死の者に歎願する。そして、確固とした足取りで出口へと踏み出す…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She recognises the prayer and immediately joins you. She recites the familiar words, merging with you in a single plea to the Undying One, and confidently steps in the direction of the exit...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は祈りの言葉を認識し、すぐにあなたに合わせる。彼女は慣れ親しんだ言葉を復唱し、あなたと一体になって不死の者に歎願する。そして、確固とした足取りで出口へと踏み出す…{/n}

languages.text: {n}她听清了你的祷词，立刻与你一同祈祷。她背诵着熟悉的话语，与你一同向不死之神发出祈求，充满自信地朝出口的方向走去……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She recognises the prayer and immediately joins you. She recites the familiar words, merging with you in a single plea to the Undying One, and confidently steps in the direction of the exit...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她听清了你的祷词，立刻与你一同祈祷。她背诵着熟悉的话语，与你一同向不死之神发出祈求，充满自信地朝出口的方向走去……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie erkennt das Gebet und fällt sofort mit ein. Sie spricht die vertrauten Worte, bildet mit dir eine einzige Bitte an den Todlosen und macht beherzt einen Schritt in Richtung Ausgang ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She recognises the prayer and immediately joins you. She recites the familiar words, merging with you in a single plea to the Undying One, and confidently steps in the direction of the exit...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie erkennt das Gebet und fällt sofort mit ein. Sie spricht die vertrauten Worte, bildet mit dir eine einzige Bitte an den Todlosen und macht beherzt einen Schritt in Richtung Ausgang ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elle reconnaît la prière et se joint aussitôt à vous. Elle récite l'oraison familière, mêlant sa voix à la vôtre en un seul et même appel à l'Immortel, et s'avance d'une démarche assurée en direction de la sortie...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She recognises the prayer and immediately joins you. She recites the familiar words, merging with you in a single plea to the Undying One, and confidently steps in the direction of the exit...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Duayı hatırlamasıyla birlikte anında sana katılıyor. Aşina olduğu sözleri ezberden okuyarak Ölmeyen'e sunduğun tek bir ricada seninle bir oluyor ve kendine güvenerek çıkışa uzanan yola adım atıyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She recognises the prayer and immediately joins you. She recites the familiar words, merging with you in a single plea to the Undying One, and confidently steps in the direction of the exit...{/n}
